Package game.engine

Interface Player<A extends Action>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - type of actions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyPlayer, GomokuPlayer, GreedyPlayer, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer
    public interface Player<A extends Action>
    Describes players of the games and the type of actions, can be performed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      A getAction​(java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.Integer,A>> prevActions, long[] remainingTimes)
      Returns the next action of a player.
      int getColor()
      Returns the color of a player.

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        A getAction​(java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.Integer,A>> prevActions,
            long[] remainingTimes)
        Returns the next action of a player.
        Parameters:
        prevActions - list of action history that are pairs of player color and action. Contains the enemy actions for the previous round only.
        remainingTimes - the overall remaining times of the players in the game, indexed by the color of the players
        Returns:
        next action

      • getColor

        int getColor()
        Returns the color of a player.
        Returns:
        color
